official_title: To allow the Resolution Trust Corporation to acquire property for its own use from an institution for which it has been appointed conservator or receiver only if the property has been offered for sale or lease to the public.
short_title: Resolution Trust Corporation Competitive Procurement Reform Act

summary.text: Resolution Trust Corporation Competitive Procurement Reform Act - Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to authorize the Resolution Trust Corporation to acquire property for its own use from an institution for which it has been appointed conservator or receiver only if the property has been offered for public sale or lease.

titles.title: Resolution Trust Corporation Competitive Procurement Reform Act

To allow the Resolution Trust Corporation to acquire property for its own use from an institution for which it has been appointed conservator or receiver only if the property has been offered for sale or lease to the public.
